SELECT count(p.product_num) FROM product p LEFT JOIN product_order o ON p.product_num = o.product_num WHERE p.product_status = 'SOLD' AND o.product_num IS NULL;

SELECT TO_CHAR(created_date, 'MM') AS month, SUM(amount) AS total_sales FROM orders WHERE order_date >= ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YYYY'), -12) AND order_date < TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') GROUP BY TO_CHAR(created_date, 'MM') ORDER BY month;
